abstract: JPMorgan Chase has agreed to buy a 4.7 stake in the London Metal Exchange for £25 million, or $38.9 million, from the bankrupt brokerage MF Global.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has agreed to buy a 4.7 stake in the London Metal Exchange for £25 million, or $38.9 million, from the bankrupt brokerage MF Global.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — JPMorgan Chase has agreed to buy a 4.7 stake in the London Metal Exchange for $38.9 million from the bankrupt brokerage MF Global, according to people with knowledge of the deal.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Buy MF Global Stake in London Metal Exchange

byline.original: By Mark Scott and Michael J. de la Merced
